publicationStmt.p: Indication of work done and date, Wheaton College

sourceDesc.p: From the Marion B. Gebbie Archives and Special Collections at the Madeleine Clark Wallace Library, Wheaton College

row.cell: To rent of chamber from date
" 1 buss potatoes (struck through) " house rent 1 quarter 1250
To milk pr. July 28th to Oct 7 46qts 3x
To cash three dollars on the 3d oct.
To cash to pay Fishman with
To tenement for gardener from 8th unt.
To paying yr order to S. A. Chapin
